title: Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: software development,software testing,git,swift programming,testing methodologies,uikit,core data,appium
jobDescription:
Project Role :Application Developer


Project Role Description :Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.
Must have skills :Swift Programming Language

Good to have skills :Cloud-based Architectures
Minimum 5 year(s) of experience is required

Educational Qualification :B Tech Or Equivalent
Summary:As an Application Developer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and configuring applications to meet business process and application requirements using Swift Programming Language. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, developing and testing applications, and ensuring the quality of the codebase.
Roles & Responsibilities:
  • Design, develop, and test applications using Swift Programming Language.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize features and functionality.
  • Ensure the quality of the codebase by conducting code reviews and implementing best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise, working with the team to identify and resolve problems.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in software development, and apply them to improve the application development process. Professional & Technical Skills:
  • Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Swift Programming Language.
  • Good To Have Skills:Experience with other programming languages such as Objective-C, Java, or Kotlin.
  • Strong understanding of software development principles and best practices.
  • Experience with iOS development frameworks such as UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation.
  • Experience with version control systems such as Git or SVN.
  • Solid grasp of software testing methodologies and tools such as XCTest or Appium. Additional Information:
  • The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Swift Programming Language.
  • The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering high-quality software applications.
  • This position is based at our Pune office.QualificationB Tech Or Equivalent

title: Application Developer
tagsAndSkills: React Native Apps,Android Application Development,Mobile Applications,Ios Development,React Native Js,Web Application Development,React Native,mobile application development
jobDescription:
• Designing, deploying, and managing web and mobile applications that can run on multiple platforms
  • Utilizing React Native to design and develop UI components for web and mobile apps based on JavaScript
  • Writing effective, scalable, and reusable JavaScript code can help create interchangeable front-end modules
  • Improving front-end performance by diagnosing and fixing all system errors and bugs
  • Using other JavaScript libraries (like Redux”) to make asynchronous API calls and enhance website/mobile app performance
  • Creating plans to transition React-based web and mobile apps to React Native
  • Planning the data and presentation layer for the front end of all applications
  • Collaborating with design, development, and customer service teams to properly understand client requirements and build top-notch apps within the stipulated time and budget

Key Requirements

  • You hold a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer/Management Information Systems, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or an associated field
  • You possess at least X years of hands-on experience as a React Native Engineer or in a similar role
  • You have a good working knowledge of HTML and CSS
  • You are well-versed in all aspects of JavaScript
  • You have in-depth knowledge of UI/UX designs and wireframes
  • You possess an expert-level understanding of React.js and its fundamentals
  • You are familiar with Gradle, XCode, and other native build tools
  • You have experience working with automated testing suites like Mocha, Jest, etc
  • You deeply understand REST APIs, offline storage, and the document request model
  • You have strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities
  • You possess excellent communication skills that facilitate interaction with multiple stakeholders
  • You are confident, detail-oriented, and highly motivated to contribute to the organization's growth as part of a high-performing team
  • You have the ability to work under pressure and adhere to tight deadlines

Perks and benefits

Best as per Industry Standards

title: Hybrid App Developer
jobDescription:
• Extensive knowledge about Hybrid(Ionic) App development. This includes the whole process, from the first line of code to publishing in the store(s).
  • Experience with Ionic mobile development frameworks Cordova / (Capacitor [Preferable]).
  • Experience with native build tools, like XCode, Gradle, Android Studio, IntelliJ for taking build both debug and release.
  • Experience with the JSON format.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs and mobile libraries for networking.
  • Experience with profiling and debugging mobile applications.
  • Strong knowledge of architectural patterns MVP, MVC, MVVM, and Clean Architecture and the ability to choose the best solution for the app.
  • Understanding mobile app design guidelines on each platform and being aware of their differences.
  • Experience with Git.
  • Experience with push notifications
Key Responsibilities
  • Writing clean, readable, and testable code
  • Cooperating with back-end developers, designers, and the rest of the team to deliver well-architected and high-quality solutions
  • Fixing bugs and performance problems

title: Senior Mobile App Developer
jobDescription:
• Produce fully functional mobile applications writing clean code
  • Gather specific requirements and suggest solutions.
  • Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions.
  • Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance.
  • Design interfaces to improve user experience
  • Liaise with Product development team to plan new features
  • Ensure new and legacy applications meet quality standards
  • Research and suggest new mobile products, applications and protocol
  • Stay up to date with new technology trends
  • Co-ordinate with backend Team for API integrations.

Additional skills (IT, languages, etc.):

a) Technical:

  • Expertise in developing hybrid mobile apps and PWA using the Ionic framework.
  • Familiarity with the JSON format.
  • Good Knowledge on Phone Gap and Cordova.
  • Must have Excellent knowledge on Angular, typescript.
  • Should have expertise knowledge on using REST APIs.
  • Strong Object-oriented program ability.
  • Experience of working with SCRUM Agile methodology.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools Git, GitHub/Bitbucket/GitLab.
  • Added knowledge of programming languages like Swift and Java.

b) Functional:

  • Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
  • Expertise in implementation of Continuous build and delivery of Mobile Applications.
  • Experience with profiling and debugging mobile applications.
  • Able to understand the Client Requirements Properly.

Experience/Education:

  • BE / B. Tech. / MCA (IT/Computer Science) or equivalent degree
